0.speaker: sol
0.text: Oh no...

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Look at all of the animals up ahead. It's gonna take us forever to make it out!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Um, n-n-not to scare you Dolly, sorry...

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Um, Dolly? You ok?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: I... I think so...

0.speaker: sol
0.text: You sure? You're not scared?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Oh no, I'm still quite terrified. Our current circumstances certainly don't look good.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Oh...

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: But, after that last part of the forest... Well, I think we can make it.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: You said before we just had to take it one step at a time. And we made it to the end! You led us out!

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: So even though things aren't good, I trust you Sol. I'm glad that we can go through it together.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Aww, you really mean that Dolly?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Of course!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Well gee, thanks!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: And you're absolutely right. We can make it! Just one step at a time.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Yes! Now, let's see what those bothersome squirrels see...

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Hey, we found the way out! I can see mom and dad's car!

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Oh goodie goodie! We should go let them know we're ok. I can't believe we made it out!

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Yes, I can't believe you made it out either. That was quite an... impressive feat.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Wh- hey! You again?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Oh no...! You're not going to keep us from leaving, are you?

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Hmm...? Why would I do that?

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: I've been encouraging you both to leave this whole time. Why would I want to hinder that?

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Because you're a devilish creature of the dark who preys on the innocent, devours the weak, and subsists on the suffering of children and dolls alike?

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: BAHAHAHAHA!!!

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: I've been called many things, but that is a new one.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: Oh.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: What else have you been called?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Um, Dolly? Maybe now isn't the best time for questions?

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Yes, you should listen to your friend. You are still in my domain, after all.

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: I would encourage you to move along. You wouldn't want to overstay your welcome.

0.speaker: dolly
0.text: U-um, of course not! We'll see ourselves out now.

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Take care, ha ha...
